VisitorFunds is committed to simplifying the administrative tasks of Head of Departments (HODs)

 Key Features: 

 1) User Account Creation and Faculty Information: 
 HODs can create their accounts and securely add visitor faulty information, including valid email addresses. Upon successful addition of a faculty member, an email is sent to their provided email address, containing a unique username and a link to access the faulty app. 

2) Lecture Activity Management: 
 The admin application receives pending lecture activities from faculty members, allowing HODs to review and verify them. HODs have the ability to accept or reject pending lecture activities, ensuring accurate tracking and transparency. The application tracks faculty activity, providing valuable insights into the number of approved, rejected, and pending lectures. 

3) Billing Generation: 
 HODs can generate lecturer bills in PDF format based on the selected month and year. The application allows for the inclusion of fixed salary amounts for theory and practical lectures, simplifying the billing process. 

4) Important Documents and Notices: 
 The admin application provides access to essential documents, such as college timetables and notices, allowing for easy distribution to faculty members and clients.
